title: Giants-Raiders, Patrick Mahomes, Aaron Rodgers, MVP, and the Blazing 5
itunes:title: Giants-Raiders, Patrick Mahomes, Aaron Rodgers, MVP, and the Blazing 5
description:
Colin explains why the Oakland Raiders and the New York Giants are a mess, why he feels Kansas City Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes will fail this weekend, an injury update on Green Bay Packers QB Aaron Rodgers, who should be considered the MVP in the NFL right now, and his Blazing 5 picks. Guests include Bryan Cox, Peter King, Eric Dickerson, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
